document_data.name: Kulaga
document_data.mainbody: '''Kulaga''' was a male [[logokron]] that was a [[fiend patron]] for [[warlock]]s in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In [[1486 DR]], [[Lorcan]] hoped to bargain with Kulaga. Lorcan and [[Farideh]] went to the small fortress home of Kulaga and confronted the patron and Adastreia and at last after a brief battle Kulaga agreed to a parley.
document_data.Personality: Kulaga was an incredible spymaster and a practitioner of [[true name]] magic.
document_data.Relationship: Kulaga was the patron of a warlock heir of the [[Toril thirteen]] called [[Adastreia Tyrianicus]]. He could summon some [[barbazu]] and had two [[flesh golem]] bodyguards.
